property.caption: Slider Type
property.description: Type of slider

property.caption: Value Entity
property.description: Select the entity that represents a slider value.

property.caption: XPath constraint
property.description: Optional constraint to filter the available options

property.caption: Value Attribute
property.description: Attribute that holds the value of the slider item. If this, load microflow and value entity are set up, min, max and step properties are ignored.

property.caption: Sort order
property.description: The sort order of the objects

property.caption: Attribute
property.description: An attribute to sort on

property.caption: Order
property.description: The order in which to sort

property.caption: From Association
property.description: Select the association that represents the selected from value

property.caption: To Association
property.description: Select the association that represents the selected from value

property.caption: Limit From Movement
property.description: If true, allows the From handle's movement to be limited

property.caption: From Minimum (Default)
property.description: If Limit From Movement is true, sets the minimum allowed value for the From handle. This is the index (0 based) of the 'Value Entity' object retrieved.

property.caption: From Minimum
property.description: If Limit From Movement is true, sets the minimum allowed value for the From handle based on an attribute. This is the index (0 based) of the 'Value Entity' object retrieved.

property.caption: From Maximum (Default)
property.description: If Limit From Movement is true, sets the maximum allowed value for the From handle. This is the index (0 based) of the 'Value Entity' object retrieved.

property.caption: From Maximum
property.description: If Limit From Movement is true, sets the maximum allowed value for the From handle based on an attribute. This is the index (0 based) of the 'Value Entity' object retrieved.

property.caption: Show From Shadow
property.description: If true, highlights the allowed zone based for the From handle

property.caption: Limit To Movement
property.description: If true, allows the To handle's movement to be limited

property.caption: To Minimum (Default)
property.description: If Limit From Movement is true, sets the minimum allowed value for the To handle. This is the index (0 based) of the 'Value Entity' object retrieved.

property.caption: To Minimum
property.description: If Limit From Movement is true, sets the minimum allowed value for the To handle based on an attribute. This is the index (0 based) of the 'Value Entity' object retrieved.

property.caption: To Maximum (Default)
property.description: If Limit From Movement is true, sets the maximum allowed value for the To handle. This is the index (0 based) of the 'Value Entity' object retrieved.

property.caption: To Maximum
property.description: If Limit From Movement is true, sets the maximum allowed value for the To handle based on an attribute. This is the index (0 based) of the 'Value Entity' object retrieved.

property.caption: Show To Shadow
property.description: If true, highlights the allowed zone based for the To handle

property.caption: Show Grid
property.description: Enables grid of values.

property.caption: Prefix
property.description: Set prefix for values. Will be set up right before the number

property.caption: Postfix
property.description: Set postfix for values. Will be set up after the number

property.caption: Disabled
property.description: If true, makes the slider disabled.

property.caption: Disabled via attribute
property.description: Optional, set's slider disabled property based on attribute (true = disabled, false = enabled)

property.caption: Visible
property.description: If true, makes the slider visible.

property.caption: Visible via attribute
property.description: Optional, set's slider visibility property based on attribute (true = visible, false = hidden)
